mapper.select: SELECT JOBOFFER_ROOM_IDX FROM JOBOFFER_ROOMS WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND COMPANY_USER_IDX = (SELECT COMPANY_USER_IDX FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT WHERE COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX = #{company_recruit_idx}) ORDER BY JOBOFFER_ROOM_REGDATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOBOFFER_ROOMS ( JOBOFFER_ROOM_IDX, USER_IDX, COMPANY_USER_IDX ) VALUES ( JOBOFFER_ROOMS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_idx}, (SELECT COMPANY_USER_IDX FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT WHERE COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX = #{company_recruit_idx}) )
